name: wikipedia
description: Gets information about a Wikipedia article
noResults: Wikipedia returned no results, please try again with other search terms.
abortError: Wikipedia took too long to respond, please try again later.
unknownResponse: I received a response I do not expect, this is a bug. Please report it to my developers.
unknownError: I received an unknown error, but it may be resolved by trying again later.
interWiki: I found a Wikipedia article on {{link}}.
